title: How to install the Android 13 preview on Google Pixel
content:
Android 13 is several months away from its formal debut, but Google has opened up the first previews for its latest mobile operating system today with new features and more. If you’re on a Google Pixel smartphone, you can install Android 13 now. Here’s how, and why you should probably wait.

more…

The post How to install the Android 13 preview on Google Pixel appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has released the first preview of Android 13, and in this article we'll show you how to install it on Google Pixel phones.
